opsgenie_api_key_desc: The API Key for calling Opsgenie REST API.
opsgenie_notify_only_desc: If disabled the message will be written to the channel
opsgenie_api_integration_key_desc: The API Integration Key for Alerts REST API.
opsgenie_api_url_desc: Opsgenie API URL of the format https://api.opsgenie.com/v2/. In general don't need to change.
opsgenie_domain_desc: Your Opsgenie domain (the one by default is just an example).
